Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminController
    The class for all actions related to Super-admin settings
    CineplexManager
    The class that loads in all the cineplexes and cinemas from a CSV file and store them in a hashtable
    CustomerController
    Class used to manage Users
    LoggerController
    This class is for creating and reading logs entries
    MovieListController
    The class for all action related to movielist, movie controller
    PriceManager
    The class use to manage the price of tickets, calculate price of tickets.
    PrintMovieList
    This class is to handle printing of movielist and review
    ReviewController
    The class for all action related to Reviews, review controller
    SlotManager
    The class that is used to manage slots
    StaffMovieListController
    This class is for CRUD functions related to Movies
    StaffPriceController
    This class is for CRU functions related to ticket pricings
    StaffSlotController
    This controller is for show time creation
    TicketManager
    The class that manages all tickets and create ticket IDs
